text: Aljaž Bedene was the defending champion, and retained his title after defeat Nicolás Kicker 7–6(7–3), 6–4. Stefano Napolitano defeated Augusto Virgili in the qualifying 6–0, 6–3, winning the first set without dropping a single point, so called golden set. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== ==External links== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Distal and ITR Group Tennis Cup - Singles 2015 Singles
title: 2015 Distal & ITR Group Tennis Cup – Singles
